short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instantly share any web URL to any device(s) capable of reading QR codes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: With QR Handoff, a unique QR code is generated for every URL you visit.  If you'd like to continue with the URL on another device, simply click the extension icon and scan the resulting QR code with your device.  QR codes are not stored, rather they are discarded after leaving the website.
